name: Project Bliss
blurb: Bliss is a game about exploring a sacred and mystical land in need of healing.

rewards.reward: *Eternal Gratitude*\r\nYour name on our Thank you page and a desktop wallpaper for backing our project.
*Find your Bliss*\r\nReceive a DRM-free copy of the game Bliss, as well as a spot on our Thank you page and a desktop wallpaper.
*Music for the Soul*\r\nDigital Copy of the original soundtrack by composer Jonathan Yandel! Plus all of the previous rewards.
*Bliss T-Shirt*\r\nReceive a T-Shirt capturing the art of Bliss -  plus all of the previous rewards. Additional international shipping costs.
*Friends of Bliss*\r\nTwo incredible posters created by our guest artists - Gabriel Bautista and Kevin Harrell - plus all of the previous rewards.
*Bliss Retail Edition*\r\nReceive a retail-like boxed copy of Bliss which includes a game disc, the soundtrack, and mini art book instruction manual.
*Boxed Deluxe Edition*\r\nThe retail-box plus posters from the guest artists AND the Bliss T-Shirt. Plus a digital copy and soundtrack, the Thank you page, and desktop wallpaper.

*The Art of Bliss*\r\nYou will receive a softcover art book displaying concept art from Bliss. Includes a digital DRM-free copy of Bliss, as well as the desktop wallpaper, Thank you page, Original Soundtrack,  guest posters, and T-shirt.

*Art of Bliss Limited Edition*\r\nEnjoy a copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, Thank you page, Original Soundtrack, autographed guest posters and T-Shirt. You also receive a LIMITED EDITION AUTOGRAPHED LINEN BOUND HARDCOVER art book displaying concept art from Bliss.(Autographed by Designer/CEO Eric Blomquist)
*Statuesque Bliss*\r\nYou will get a Bliss statue standing 6" tall.\r\nPlus a copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, Thank you page, Original Soundtrack, guest posters and T-Shirt.

*Bliss Statue AND Art Book Limited Edition*\r\nThe AUTOGRAPHED Bliss statue and Hardcover art book are yours!\r\nEnjoy a copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, thank you page, soundtrack, guest posters, t-shirt, and a Special Thanks in the game credits.

*Bliss Work of Art Edition*\r\nWhen you pledge $350, the AUTOGRAPHED Bliss statue and Hardcover art book  along with 1 of 5 original watercolor works by our developer and CEO Eric Blomquist. Includes copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, Thank you page, soundtrack, guest posters t-shirt, and a Special Thanks in the game credits.

*Game with Us Edition*\r\nYou get to have a gaming night with the dev team! (You can try your luck at Starcraft 2 :3) We can crush you in your favorite game!  \r\nIncludes the retail box copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, Thank you page, soundtrack,  guest posters, t-shirt, art book, statue, and a Special Thanks in the game credits.

*Learn from Team Bliss Edition*\r\nThis Edition includes 2 - 1 hour private online tutoring session with the dev team member of your choice. Whether it be programming, developing, composition, etc. Includes the retail box copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, Thank you page, soundtrack,  guest posters, t-shirt, art book, and statue.

*Share your Inspiration Edition*\r\n Be one of only 10 people to SUBMIT YOUR FAVORITE INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE TO BE PLACED IN THE GAME. Bliss has many quotes that will be appearing on screen and in the environment, and you can be a part of that. Submitted upon approval. Includes the retail box copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, SPECIAL THANKS in the credits, soundtrack, guest posters, t-shirt, AUTOGRAPHED Bliss statue and Hardcover art book are yours.

*Hang with the Dev Edition*\r\nHang out with the dev team for a day in Chicago! We will hangout, eat some local grub and have a good time. All you have to do is get there! (Travel costs not included) Also, Includes the retail box copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper,SPECIAL THANKS in the credits, soundtrack, AUTOGRAPHED guest posters, t-shirt. autographed Bliss statue and Hardcover art book.

*Tell your Story Edition*\r\nIf you have a life changing story or challenge that you had to face and would like to tell that story in the game Bliss, we will have you work personally with our Designer Eric Blomquist and put it in the final version of the game!  Includes the retail box copy of Bliss, as well as the wallpaper, SPECIAL THANKS in the credits, soundtrack, AUTOGRAPHED guest posters, t-shirt. autographed Bliss statue and Hardcover art book.
